name: Who Dies First?
description:
Are you ready for the challenge? Let’s begin an epic stickman battle!

So, who dies first? The answer for this question you will know after playing our amazing new game with tons of fun and stupid ragdoll stickman.

The rules of the game are quite simple. Choose the hero you like most, arm him with a weapon set and begin the epic stickman battle. Use different items to kick the buddy on the opposite side and make him die first. Sounds easy, right?

Why Who Dies Last? is a cool game:

- Addictive gameplay
- Amazing graphics
- Bright animations
- Great variety of weapons
- Different ragdoll stickman skins
- Epic fights
- Dumb and funny ways to die

Destroy and explode, shoot and fire, smash and hit in Who Dies Last? stickman fighting game! Use your imagination and invent various strategies to kick your enemy and win this stickman battle.

Collect a wide arsenal of weapons to outperform rivals. Rockets, grenades, automatic rifles, and even a nuclear bomb, all this and much more you can find in the weapon collection of Who Dies Last?!

What are you waiting for? Download Who Dies Last? and enjoy stickman fighting battles in ragdoll games!
